pesticide.PPE: All mixers, loaders, applicators and other handlers must wear: long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes and socks, waterproof gloves, chemical-resistant apron
pesticide.trade_Name: TZone SE Broadleaf Herbicide for Tough Weeds

Active_Ingredients.name: Triclopyr BEE, butoxyethyl ester
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Provides broad-spectrum weed control for some of the tough broadleaf weeds such as wild violet, ground ivy, oxalis and wild blackberry.

Active_Ingredients.name: Sulfentrazone
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Inhibits protoporphyrinogen oxidase (Protox), a pivotal enzyme in chlorophyll production.

Active_Ingredients.name: 2,4-D, 2-ethylhexyl ester
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Auxin-type herbicide absorbed through the leaves and translocated to the growing points causing weed stems to curl and twist.

Active_Ingredients.name: Dicamba acid
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: Absorbed through the leaves and roots and has multiple modes of actions for hard-to-kill broadleaf weeds.

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION: Harmful if swallowed. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reactions in some individuals.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-877-800-5556 for emergency medical information.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Wash immediately with soap and water.
